alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:05PM CDT until July 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 305 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Ozark, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Headland, Newton, Ariton, Newville, Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Tumbleton, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Kirkland Crossroads, Grandberry Crossroads, Mabson, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Graball and Dale County Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
